column3: The unique proprietary identifier assigned to each Building Permit entity.

The normalized stage of the permit in the building and approval process. These stages vary by jurisdiction.The list of statuses and the corresponding order is available in a separate file. This is best used for understanding of permitting lifecycle, such as building a time-series for economic analysis.
The date upon which the status in the building_permit_status field is effective. A status can be considered effective till the next status.
